Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 1
 (TAX CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 1.17 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION FOR ACQUISITION, CONSTRUCTION, EQUIPPING, OPERATION AND MAINTENANCE OF THE RICHLAND PARISH PUBLIC HEALTH UNIT.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Richland, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a tax of one and seventeen hundredths (1.17) mills on all property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $127,051.97 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018, for the purpose of acquisition, construction, equipping, operation and maintenance of the public health unit in the Parish?

Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 2
 (TAX CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 4.52 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION FOR OPERATION AND MAINTENANCE OF THE RICHLAND PARISH LIBRARY SYSTEM.
Race.FullText:
Shall the Parish of Richland, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a tax of four and fifty-two hundredths (4.52) mills on all property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $485,674.87 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years,
beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018, for the purpose of operation and maintenance of the Richland Parish Library System?

Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 3
 (TAX CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 2.15 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION FOR OPERATION AND MAINTENANCE OF THE RICHLAND PARISH LIBRARY SYSTEM.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Richland, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a tax of two and fifteen hundredths (2.15) mills on all property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $230,668.16 reasonably expected at this time from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018, for the purpose of operation and maintenance of the Richland Parish Library System?
